Hide empty status messages in roster
fix nasty yaxim notification on network disconnect
if you can not fix it, ignore it. sigh.

Remove singeTask attribute from MainWindow

Previously, due to that launchMode, it was not possible to return to
a ChatWindow from the launcher (recent apps). The launchMode attribute
was removed to enable to the user to resume a chat from a launcher by
returning directly into the previously left ChatWindow.

To prevent a MainWindow-ChatWindow-MainWindow activity stack, the service
notification was changed so that the intent fired by that intent replaces
the current activity stack.

That way, it's possible to resume a chat from the launcher (recent apps list)
and a multiple MainWindow activities from the Notification area are
prevented as well.
